page.title: 04 Population
page.content: Of the sample returning questionnaires ,39% are old established families in the area.3% moved into the district over 20 years ago.14% moved 16-20 years ago,18% moved 11-15 years ago, 13% moved 6-10 years ago and 13% moved in the last 5 years.42% moved from elsewhere in Clwyd,36% from Cheshire and Merseyside,13% from England, 2% from Scotland and 7% from abroad. Buckley has become a dormitory town alongside Mynydd Isa,for three reasons: 1.The cost of houses in the new estates in the last 20 years was and is still comparatively low. 2.Buckley and Mynydd Isa are pleasantly and conveniently situated within easy reach of Chester and N.Wales resorts and beauty spots. 3.There are many places of employment within easy reach.
